WebDriverCommandsGetWindowHandles.summary: The Get Window Handles command of the WebDriver API returns a list of all WebWindows. Each tab or window, depending on whether you are using a tabbed browser, is associated by a window handle that is used as a reference when switching to the window.

remarks.para: In order to determine whether or not a particular interaction with the browser opens a new window, one can obtain the set of window handles before the interaction is performed and compare it with the set after the action is performed.

-Switch To Window command
-Get Window Handle command
-Close Window command
